content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I reminded myself of the previous commands executed, including browsing the website lesselfes.com to learn about different cultures and using the "google" command to search for a file about love. You, as the user, used the "browse_website" command to visit the website https://www.loveisrespect.org/ to ask for signs of a healthy relationship. The website did not provide a specific list of signs, but instead provided information on healthy relationships and resources for individuals experiencing relationship abuse. Links on the website include taking a Mental Health and Substance Use Coercion Survey and navigating to different sections of the website.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide specific examples of dating violence, but it does provide information on warning signs of abuse, power and control dynamics, and how to set boundaries. It also offers resources for creating a safety plan and supporting others who may be experiencing abuse. \n \n Links: ['Take our survey today  (https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/8H83ZX7)', '\\nlove is respect\\n (https://www.loveisrespect.org)', 'Skip to navigation [n] (https://www.loveisrespect.org/#nav)', 'Skip to content [c] (https://www.loveisrespect.org/#content)', 'Skip to footer [f] (https://www.loveisrespect.org/#footer)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.loveisrespect.org/", "question": "What are some resources for creating a safety plan?"}}}'}]
"""
